name: HEY SHUGA! 12 oz- ORGANIC SUGAR CANE SYRUP
description:
Hey Shuga! is a 100% organic sugar cane syrup. The convenience of a liquid makes it perfect for hot and cold beverages, as a topping for fresh fruit, an addition to your morning cereal, an ingredient for baking, an enhancer to your Friday night cocktail, and much more.
Organic Cane Syrup (Invert), Purified Water
We ship to all 50 states plus Puerto Rico.

*Please allow 1-3 days for shipping and handling regardless of shipping service. 
We ship exclusively with FedEx. For expedited or residential shipping, please contact us at: shuga@caribbeanls.com
Orders larger than 6 bottles will be reviewed.

name: LIL' SHUGA! 8.5 oz.
description:
Lil' Shuga! is a 100% organic blend of stevia leaf extract and cane sugar. The result is a delicious blend that is two times as sweet as sugar, allowing you to use less for the same amount of sweetness. Maintain the health benefits of stevia, but with the familiar taste of cane sugar.
Organic Cane Syrup (Invert), Purified Water, Organic Reb A (Stevia Extract)
*Please allow 1-3 days for shipping and handling regardless of shipping service. 

We ship to all 50 states plus Puerto Rico.

*Please allow 1-3 days for shipping and handling regardless of shipping service. 
We ship exclusively with FedEx. For expedited or residential shipping, please contact us at: shuga@caribbeanls.com
Orders larger than 6 bottles will be reviewed.

name: Syrup Pump- Standard Head
description:
Specifications: 
White
Dispense: 8 ml or 2/7 oz
Suitable for a range of liquids
Shippable in locked down position
Two piece head design for vertical dispensing
Large-lid adaptor to fit range of lid sizes

*Please allow 1-3 days for shipping and handling regardless of shipping service.
